scripts.install:all: pnpm run install:backend && pnpm run install:frontend
scripts.lint: pnpm run lint:backend && pnpm run lint:frontend
scripts.typecheck: pnpm run typecheck:backend && pnpm run typecheck:frontend
scripts.typecheck:backend: cd backend && pnpm run typecheck || echo 'No typecheck script in backend'
scripts.typecheck:frontend: cd frontend && pnpm run typecheck || echo 'No typecheck script in frontend'
